# Use

```{r setup}
library(reol)
```

## Get a species ID

```
df <- get_eol_page("Homo sapiens")
knitr::kable(df)
```

## Get URLs for species images

```
df <- get_image_urls_from_name("Homo sapiens")
knitr::kable(df)
```
